30 Day Money Back Guarantee
If you're unsatisfied with your shots, for any reason, we'll give you a full refund–no return necessary!

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.text:
Key Ingredients in Glow Shot

  • High-Potency Marine Collagen (10,000 mg) – Sourced from select fish (including tilapia and cod), this premium collagen helps support skin elasticity, hydration, and firmness.
  • Hibiscus Flower Extract – A powerful antioxidant that helps protect the skin from oxidative stress and environmental damage.
  • Nutritional Yeast – A natural source of essential nutrients that contribute to skin vitality and overall wellness.
  • Liposomal Delivery System – An advanced absorption technology that ensures each ingredient is efficiently delivered to the body for maximum benefits.

Additional Ingredients: Water, natural flavors, citric acid.A clean, high-quality formula free from added sugars and artificial preservatives — because your skin deserves the best!

settings.title: How to use
settings.text:
HOW TO USE

Drink one shot daily — either straight from the bottle or over ice with sparkling water. Enjoy with or without food. Shake well before drinking.

STORAGE
Store at room temperature, away from direct sunlight to preserve potency. Consume within 18 months.

A QUICK NOTE We recommend consulting your healthcare provider before adding any supplements to your routine, particularly if you have any health conditions or are taking medications.

Have more questions? See our FAQs.
Physician-Formulated
Clinically-Validated Doses
Premium Ingredients
100% Natural
No Added Sugars
Incredible Peach & Mango Taste

settings.title: Fast, Visible Results
settings.text: In as little as 4 weeks, you'll notice softer, smoother skin. By 12 weeks, expect firmer, more resilient skin, strengthened nails, and an overall revitalized appearance.

settings.title: Hydrated, Radiant Skin
settings.text: Glow Shot delivers deep hydration, improving skin texture, reducing dryness, and restoring a luminous, healthy glow from within.

settings.title: Protection Against Environmental Stress
settings.text: The antioxidant power of hibiscus extract helps combat oxidative damage from pollution and UV exposure, keeping your skin healthier for longer.

settings.title: Enhanced Skin Firmness and Elasticity
settings.text: Thanks to its potent 10,000 mg dose of marine collagen, Glow Shot supports your skin's structure by rebuilding collagen density, improving elasticity, and reducing sagging.

settings.title: Holistic Beauty Support
settings.text: Beyond skin hydration, Glow Shot supports stronger nails and improved hair resilience, giving you a comprehensive beauty boost.

settings.title: THE MAIN BENEFITS OF glow shot
settings.text: Empowering beauty and vitality.
WHAT MAKES glow shot different?
The First Collagen That Evolves With You
Unlike traditional collagen that only replenishes, Glow Shot adapts to your skin’s changing needs at every stage of life.
High-Potency Marine Collagen (10,000 mg)
Derived from tilapia, cod, and other premium sources, Glow Shot’s collagen is highly bioavailable, meaning it’s absorbed efficiently to improve your skin’s resilience, firmness, and texture.
Liposomal Delivery Technology
Unlike standard supplements, Glow Shot uses advanced liposomal technology to maximize nutrient absorption. This means the collagen and antioxidants reach your skin cells faster and more effectively.
Clean and Conscious Formula
Glow Shot is free from artificial preservatives, added sugars, and unnecessary fillers. It’s a clean-label solution you can trust.

settings.title: High-Potency Marine Collagen (10,000MG)
settings.what_it_does:
• Boosts skin elasticity and firmness by replenishing collagen levels. 
  • Improves skin hydration and reduces visible fine lines. 
  • Promotes stronger nails and healthier hair.
settings.why_its_special: Marine collagen, sourced from tilapia and cod, is highly bioavailable,  meaning it’s absorbed efficiently and works faster than other types of collagen.

settings.title: Liposomal Delivery Technology
settings.what_it_does:
• Enhances nutrient absorption, ensuring that the marine collagen and other active ingredients are delivered directly to your skin cells.
  • Provides quicker, more noticeable results compared to traditional delivery systems.
settings.why_its_special: • This cutting-edge technology encapsulates nutrients in tiny lipid molecules, optimizing their journey through your body.

settings.title: Hibiscus Extract
settings.what_it_does:
• Provides powerful antioxidant protection against oxidative stress, environmental pollutants, and UV damage.
  • Helps maintain a healthy, youthful skin tone by fighting free radicals.
settings.why_its_special: Hibiscus is known as the “Botox plant” for its natural ability to tighten skin and enhance radiance without invasive procedures.

settings.title: Nutritional Yeast
settings.what_it_does:
• Delivers essential nutrients, including B vitamins, that support skin vitality.
  • Promotes overall wellness and energy levels, complementing your beauty routine.
settings.why_its_special: This nutrient-rich ingredient not only supports beauty but also adds a holistic wellness boost.

settings.title: Clean, Natural Flavors
settings.what_it_does: • Provides a delicious, easy-to-drink experience without added sugars or artificial preservatives.
settings.why_its_special: • Glow Shot is designed with purity in mind, ensuring a clean-label product that fits seamlessly into your lifestyle.

settings.title: INGREDIENTS THAT make the difference
settings.text: Glow Shot is powered by a clean, scientifically backed formula designed to deliver real results.  Each ingredient plays a vital role in supporting your skin’s health, hydration, and radiance.

settings.title: NO ADDED SUGARS
settings.text: Keeps your wellness goals on track.

settings.title: NO ARTIFICIAL PRESERVATIVES
settings.text: Prioritizes your health with a clean formula.

settings.title: BACKED BY SCIENCE
settings.text: Ingredients chosen for their proven benefits to skin, hair, and nails.

settings.slide_item_text: With 10,000 mg per serving, Glow Shot delivers one of the most potent doses of marine collagen, ensuring faster and more noticeable results compared to many competitors.
Glow Shot stands out with advanced liposomal technology, which enhances nutrient absorption for maximum effectiveness. Most competitors rely on standard delivery systems that are less efficient.
While many competitors focus solely on hydration or elasticity, Glow Shot targets both hydration and firmness, making it a comprehensive beauty solution.
The inclusion of hibiscus extract for antioxidant protection and nutritional yeast for added skin vitality goes beyond basic collagen benefits, giving Glow Shot a unique edge.
Unlike powders or capsules that require mixing or additional steps, Glow Shot is pre-packaged for daily use, fitting effortlessly into busy lifestyles.

settings.title: Key Differentiators for Glow Shot
settings.text: Our formula features a carefully curated blend of potent ingredients, each selected for its unique ability to support your healthy aging journey.

Increased Hydration

Skin feels more supple and deeply moisturized.

Improved Firmness

Early signs of enhanced collagen density in the deeper skin layers.

Healthier Appearance

A visible glow begins to emerge as hydration is restored.

Enhanced Elasticity

Skin feels more resilient and smooth,  with a reduction in fine lines.

Smoother Texture

Noticeable improvements in overall skin tone and texture.

Stronger Nails

Nails become less brittle and grow faster.

Full Skin Transformation

Firmer, more youthful skin with visibly reduced sagging and wrinkles.

A radiant, even skin tone that highlights your natural glow.

Enhanced skin resilience to environmental stressors like UV rays and pollution.

Stronger Nails and Hair

Nails show lasting strength, while hair appears healthier and more resilient.

settings.title: VISIBLE RESULTS backed by science
settings.text: Glow Shot is designed to deliver real, noticeable improvements to your skin, nails, and overall appearance. With consistent daily use, you’ll see a transformation in just weeks.

settings.text_section: Forget “a glass of wine”—elevate to an antioxidant celebration, without the alcohol. Each shot delivers 220 mg of 98% purity Resveratrol, equal to 43 bottles of red wine. Toast to vibrant health and longevity with every sip.

settings.question: HOW OFTEN SHOULD I USE GLOW SHOT?
settings.answer: Glow Shot is designed for daily use. Simply drink one bottle a day to maximize the benefits for your skin, nails, and overall beauty.

settings.question: WHEN WILL I SEE RESULTS?
settings.answer: Many users notice improvements in skin hydration and glow within 4 weeks. By 8 weeks, elasticity and smoothness become more apparent. After 12 weeks, you can expect firmer, more radiant skin and stronger nails.

settings.question: WHAT MAKES GLOW SHOT DIFFERENT FROM OTHER COLLAGEN SUPPLEMENTS?
settings.answer:
Glow Shot stands out for its:

  • High-Potency Collagen (10,000 mg): Among the most potent doses available.
  • Liposomal Technology: Ensures superior nutrient absorption for faster and more effective results.
  • Additional Benefits: Includes hibiscus extract and nutritional yeast for antioxidant protection and overall vitality.

settings.question: IS GLOW SHOT SAFE?
settings.answer: Yes, Glow Shot is made with clean, high-quality ingredients free from added sugars and artificial preservatives. However, if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medications, or have a medical condition, it’s best to consult your physician before use.

settings.question: CAN I TAKE GLOW SHOT WITH OTHER SUPPLEMENTS?
settings.answer: Yes, Glow Shot can complement most supplements. Its clean formula is designed to integrate seamlessly into your wellness routine. For specific concerns, consult your healthcare provider.

settings.question: DOES GLOW SHOT TASTE GOOD?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Glow Shot has a light, refreshing taste with natural flavors. It’s enjoyable on its own or can be mixed into your favorite beverages.

settings.question: IS GLOW SHOT ECO-FRIENDLY?
settings.answer: Glow Shot is committed to transparency and quality, sourcing sustainable marine collagen and packaging responsibly.

settings.question: DOES GLOW SHOT WORK FOR HAIR AND NAILS TOO?
settings.answer: Yes! The high-potency collagen supports not only your skin but also contributes to stronger, healthier nails and more resilient hair.

settings.question: CAN I SKIP DAYS AND STILL SEE RESULTS?
settings.answer: For the best and most consistent results, daily use is recommended. Missing occasional days won’t harm progress, but consistency ensures maximum benefits.

settings.question: WHERE IS GLOW SHOT MADE?
settings.answer: Glow Shot is proudly distributed by Happy Aging in Miami, FL, adhering to the highest standards in supplement formulation.
